[ library(ic_gap_sbdd) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

sbdd_labeling(?List)

Instantiate all integer SBDD variables in a list to elements of their domains
List
A list of integer SBDD variables or integers

Description

Like labeling/1, but uses sbdd_indomain/1 to do the instantiation so that the SBDD dominance checks are performed appropriately.

See Also

fd : labeling / 1, ic : labeling / 1, sbdd_indomain / 1
